Hi Ben,

I hope all is well, we are working with Fresh flowers update in staging. Please see the below:

https://stg-dressedforsale-mel.kinsta.cloud/ (You can use your same login from the live site.)

For adding fresh flowers, it's going to be a 2 step process.

Step 1, when you are creating the quote on screen 4. 'Styling Proposal', you can add 'Fresh Flowers'. Note, this is only for normal rooms and not optional extra rooms. This will allow the flowers option to appear on the room cards in the client's proposal view.

Step 2, when you are on screen 5. 'Quote Summary', you will see a field where called 'Fresh Flowers / Greenery' where you can add the total (once off) charge for fresh flowers/greenery on the job.

We have had to set it up this way to work within the architecture of the current quote set up.

Let me know if this works for you? Thanks!

For adding fresh flowers, it's going to be a 2 step process.

Step 1, when you are creating the quote on screen 4. 'Styling Proposal', you can add 'Fresh Flowers'. Note, this is only for normal rooms and not optional extra rooms. This will allow the flowers option to appear on the room cards in the client's proposal view.

Step 2, when you are on screen 5. 'Quote Summary', you will see a field where called 'Fresh Flowers / Greenery' where you can add the total (once off) charge for fresh flowers/greenery on the job.

We have had to set it up this way to work within the architecture of the current quote set up.

Hi Ben,

Thanks for that, we will make changes first regarding the fresh flowers. We will work on it in staging first.

Hi Joel,

Sorry the flowers/greenery price is not a weekly charge, just a once off charge per quote please

Kind Regards,

Ben Rookes

Hi Ben,

Just a note regarding fresh flowers.

When you select Fresh Flowers under room items and set its price to 250
In client side this will be multiplied by the Initial Rental Period. 250 * 4 = 1000.

Yes that works Joel thank you and Kate received the email.

rpatane@novaricollective.com FYI there is now a question on the platform that asks if a trade consult is required. When you toggle this on it will send an automated email to Kate with all the details so that she can contact the client for a trade consult.

The fresh greenery is now also live, see below example/test (pricing is adjustable)
